v8:item.v8:content: Direct connection and data import to the target infobase

On this computer or on a computer in the local network
Direct infobase connection is not supported if the client application is running on Linux.
To export data, exchange rules must be read
Debugging tools are unavailable in the web client mode

Do not use the automatic import when opening

Debugging tools are unavailable in the web client mode
Use optimized format for exchange data (V8 – V8, the data processor version not less 2.0.18)
Export objects for which there are access rights
